posts.html:
Dear Co-x3 Family,
This week, we share about leadership - how can we lead in your daily lives?
Thanks for your patience in waiting for this week's letter ￼. We've been working hard on fixing a bug that came with the recent Notion API change affecting how images are hosted, and we've since upgraded all our Notion-hosted sites to use Fruition 2.0 as well as whipped up our own unofficial plugin for gatsby + notion integration. If you've ever wanted to try creating your own blazing fast website with simple content update via Notion, start now with our updated guide!
It's been a fantastic week for our community - here are some highlights:
Our community-led accountability squads have been an exciting and positive experience in bringing our family together! We have 3 amazing squads already filled up - Olaf's Art of Creativity, Joshwin's Change Makers, and Conrad's Accountabili-buddies. Listening and learning from each other with our 3-min daily updates which gets automatically composed into a daily podcast with cappuccino has been a great way to share and discuss meaningful topics revolving around our daily battles. We'll be sharing the best pieces of value that each squad in our weekly letters.
Dean has started a Get Fit Squad taking on the Daily Fitness challenge, capping at 8 members - there are only 3 slots left! Each squad has its own unique interests and goals - sign up for the squads that resonate most with you!
Join Your Accountability Squad →
Ever wanted to build your own tribe? We want to support you in your endeavours to find your like-minded family, accomplish your success plan, and solve problems together. Grow the spaces you care about by being a leader in our family. By building your tribe within Co-x3, you benefit from economies of sharing, best practices and guidance, and unique resources like virtual meeting rooms for all your events and a dedicated space within our.co-x3.com.
Be a Leader In The Community →
Kesh warmed our hearts this week when he shared his review about our family. Here's what he had to say.
I am loving my time in the Co-x3 community. I feel like I am right where I need to be. You and this community are trying to approach life from my own philosophy and you are succeeding in a way I have not seen anywhere else. I have already learned so much. Thank you. There are just so many amazing things going on in the community, I don't know where to begin, and want to be a part of it all. That being said, everywhere I go there is an excellent roadmap telling me how to use the space, resource, or tool. So I am never frustrated that I can't participate or don't know what is going on. Just need to take the time to get settled in and do the work.
It's been an amazing journey, and we feel blessed every time we read a comment or receive a new email with such kind words - thank you so much for being awesome!
Our humble community of co-creation and collaboration has been exploding with growth and its so exciting that we now have members from over 76 countries, and it's all because of your amazing and ongoing support. As a huge thank you for our amazing family who continues to push new community-led initiatives and engagement daily, we are stepping up our content game to ensure that our content for the weekend is well-prepared by Friday for our patrons to get an early sneak preview, be the first to benefit, and help with fine-tuning for the world to see!
+10 patrons have joined our wall of love ! Thank you Bobe, Daniel, Odyssey, Mateo, Cog, Nuala, and Ray! Special shoutout for our annual supporters Kesh Sharma, Zander Macdonald, and David Holliday! With your support, we can release quality content more regularly, and provide special and customized perks for supporters like you!
Every week, we are deeply honest about important topics.
Friday Livestream: Cloning Popular Investment Trackers
This week on office hours, we cloned popular investment trackers like Mint, M1 Finance, Stash, and others in Notion with special guest D. Travis Washington. We taught about financial literacy and built the base architecture behind the investment tracking system.
Sunday Catchup: Co-x3 Weekly Council Meeting #23 (2020-Sep-13)
This week, we had a great discussion about how to continuously motivate ourselves to be intentional, and how to deal with expectations of others, and for yourself.
Article: How I built a music bot for virtual meetings on jitsi and hangouts
Enhance your quarantine social experience with this simple, free hack to play any music in any browser-based conferencing apps.
Constant learning is an important part of your growth journey, and we try to read as much as we can to learn as fast as we can. Every week, we'll share key insights from the best pieces of content we digest.
Squad Sharing: Eating the Frog - Shared by Cory
•
Do the hard executable work first thing in the morning before the brain has any chance to say no.
•
If it’s your job to eat two frogs, it’s best to eat the BIGGEST one first.
•
Your energy is limited, so spent your efforts to finish the hardest work first.
Let's get highly motivated to personally develop ourselves, develop accountability, and collaborate to bring positive social impacts to our local and global communities.
Collaboration Opportunities
•
We're looking for someone well versed in python/NLP and interested to explore a social impact project involving building an AI chatbot! We had our first meeting scoping out the project - let us know if you want to get involved!
•
We're building a collaborative knowledge factory! If you have experience with roam, obsidian, etc. let us know - we'll be happy to learn about your experience and see how we can improve it with some cool new tools...
•
Family without borders?! We're recruiting for a super team of problem solvers. Let us know if you'd like to help!
Explore all open collaboration opportunities here →
Upcoming Events
On office hours this Friday, tune in for the exciting part 2 of our exciting investment tracker build with special guest D. Travis Washington. This week, we'll implement advanced features to automatically calculate returns, rules to help you make smarter investment decisions, and integrate with your success plan.
Set A Reminder Here (and subscribe!) →
Join Our Regular Events To Level Up Everyday With Co-x3
•
Stay accountable. Report your daily stand-up with your accountability squad and get help on things you are stuck on.
•
Don't work alone. Join our daily virtual meetings to wind up/wind down for the day. Stay on to study with us or learn a new language!
•
Keep learning. Learn new ways to tackle everyday challenges at 11am Eastern every day.
Check out our events schedule →
Let's keep each other accountable on our growth journey. I'd love to start a conversation with you. Reply on this email and send your response to this question:
What is one way you can be a leader today?
posts.title: Be A Leader ✊
posts.desc: This week, we share about leadership - how can we lead in your daily lives?
